{"id":952766847,"question_id":7,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1684420630,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/952766847/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        string op;\n\n        // getting number of digits\n        int num = x;\n        int count = 0;\n        while(num!=0){\n            count+=1;\n            num = num/10;\n        }\n\n        if(x<0){\n            op = \"-\" + op;\n            x = -1*x;\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i<count; i++){\n            op = op + to_string(x%10);\n            x = x/10;\n        }\n        cout<<op<<endl;\n        return num;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
